name: Reception (Bailey)
description:
Reception is a short puzzle game created for the GMTK Game Jam.

Theme: Joined Together

Went for a simple take on the theme with multiple robots connected together via a network and orders are sent to all the robots at once but managned to explore some interesting mechanics such as loss or delay in connection.

How To Setup / Play

Best played in desktop / exe format but web build has been provided

Desktop / EXE

  • Download the zipped folder from the download options below
  • Extract the "GMTK 2021- Reception (Game In Here)"  folder to your documents
  • click on the executable ( "GMTK 2021- Reception (Play Me)")  within the folder to run the application

Web

  • Click web build link below or go to https://simmer.io/@Baileybb/gmtk-2021-reception
  • Play

Any feedback appreciated
